page.title: 04Interview : Airport Firemen
page.content: Baltasound airport owns three fire engines, and employs eight firemen who work eight hours a day.The fire engines carry foam concentrate which when mixed with water makes a substance like Fairy Liquid which freezes the fire. The Carmichael carries 600 gallons of water and 60 gallons of foam concentrate. It pumps out 400 gallons a minute.The smaller engine carries 300 gallons of water but has the water and foam already mixed. The oldest engine carries 500 gallons of water and 25 gallons of foam concentrate.It pumps out 300 gallons a minute.The firemen do lots of other things too,they load and unload aircraft and clear the runway of sheep and snow.They have 6 weeks training at the start,3 in Unst,3 down south,then take an exam,and if they pass they can work at the airport.
